subject: We sincerely apologies for the
body:
We sincerely apologies for the past years experience for being a victim of cyber crime due to the procedure you're trying to receive the funds which haven't been approved by the United States Treasury Department
After series of meetings held we wish to inform you that you are among the lucky nominated beneficiaries that their unpaid fund has been approved and relocated to Desk of Secretary Treasury Department and according to the analysis by the evaluation officer you will be receiving an official Cheque to your mailbox, Please 
you are expected to get back to Eugene John Cordeau with below information as soon as possible for more directions and instructions on how to receive your parcel.
1.
Scanned photocopy of your valid identity card
 ..................
2.Nearest international Airport......................................
3.Occupation..................................
4.Telephone Number.............................
5.Next of Kin Name and Telephone Number: ............................
Apologies for failure to pay your funds in time, which according to records in the system had been long overdue and for using personal email address to mail you in matters like these but due to the poor network server and central database system maintenance the official email address is down at the moment.
We await your responses as soon as possible.
Regards
Deputy Secretary of the Treasury
Washington DC, USA

subject: Re: We sincerely apologies for the
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about this. It's quite surprising to hear that I'm among the lucky ones whose unpaid fund has been approved. 

Could you please provide more details about this process? How was I selected and what is the exact amount of the fund? Also, could you explain why my funds were overdue?

I understand that you need a scanned photocopy of my valid identity card and next of kin name and telephone number. However, due to privacy concerns, I am not comfortable sharing these details over email. Is there any other way we can verify my identity?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: We sincerely apologies for the
body:
>
> Good Morning Daniel,  how are you doing?

I understand your panic but you don't need to worry about  anything my
e-mail is highly secured and the reason I need those details before
explanation is for security purpose, and I wouldn't like to share this
information till o verify your Identity.
To avoid explaining the whole process to imposter.
And below is attach of my valid passport.
Kindly send me the required information and I assure you that it is 100%
secured

>

subject: Re: We sincerely apologies for the
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message and the reassurances about security. I understand that verifying identity is an important step in many processes. However, I'm a bit confused about what exactly you need from me. Could you please clarify what information or details are required? 

Also, I didn't see any attachment with your message. You mentioned a passport - was that supposed to be attached? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: We sincerely apologies for the
body:
I need your full name and your house address!
For verification purpose.
Below is my ID card

Gene Cordeau

subject: Re: We sincerely apologies for the
body:
I told you everything about the reimbursement cashier check.
United States Treasury Department is reimbursing all nominated individual
for cybercrime, economy meltdown during the Pandemic, and equally to
empower business entities.
The total sum you will receive is $38,000.00 cashier Check which can be
deposited at any Bank of your choice at any country of your choice because
is international Cashier Check.
Kindly get back to me with your Full name, your full house address and
nearest airport for verification.
And you can come personally and pick up the valid cashier check or it can
be mail to your house address.
Thanks for your understanding

Gene Cordeau

body:

It's nice to meet you! I'm curious, what is the purpose of needing my full name and house address? I'm always eager to help out where I can, but I also like to understand why certain information is needed. Could you please explain a bit more about this?

Best wishes,

body:

subject: Re: We sincerely apologies for the
body:
Hello Gene Cordeau,

Wow, that sounds like a great opportunity! I'm really interested in learning more about this. Could you please explain how the United States Treasury Department is involved in this? And how does the pandemic factor into it?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "nominated individual"? Is there a selection process or something?

I'm also curious about the cashier check. How does it work exactly? Can I use it just like regular money?

Sorry for all the questions, but I'm just so excited and want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Daniel
